str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To account or treat as worthy. From axios; to deem entitled or fit.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I think, (b) I think, judge, (c) I direct the mind to, seek for, (d) I observe, (e) I care for.
To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Known, an acquaintance. From ginosko; well-known.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Everywhere, in all places. Genitive case of a presumed derivative of pas; universally.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To speak or say in opposition, contradict (oppose, resist). From anti and lego; to dispute, refuse.
From haireomai; properly, a choice, i.e. a party or disunion.
